about_the_game:
Dungeon Defenders II - Bundle of the Beast

Embrace the Demon Lord with a set of accessories that can be equipped on any hero and four unique helmets for the original four heroes! This bundle contains:

The Hellion’s Mask, Wings, Tail and Fire Ember Trail accessories that can be equipped on any hero!

The Purrnicorn Mask helmet for the Huntress.

The Bag ‘O’ Boogey helmet for the Monk.

The Pumpkin Head Folly helmet for the Apprentice.

The Dread Knight Casque helmet for the Squire.

2,000,000 Gold for a quick boost in leveling your loot.
detailed_description:
Dungeon Defenders II - Bundle of the Beast

Embrace the Demon Lord with a set of accessories that can be equipped on any hero and four unique helmets for the original four heroes! This bundle contains:

The Hellion’s Mask, Wings, Tail and Fire Ember Trail accessories that can be equipped on any hero!

The Purrnicorn Mask helmet for the Huntress.

The Bag ‘O’ Boogey helmet for the Monk.

The Pumpkin Head Folly helmet for the Apprentice.

The Dread Knight Casque helmet for the Squire.

2,000,000 Gold for a quick boost in leveling your loot.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1)
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2600 or better / NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better, 512 MB video memory, with Shader Model 3 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1) / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Quad-Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or AMD Radeon HD 4770 or better (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.

short_description: Embrace the Demon Lord with a set of accessories that can be equipped on any hero and four unique helmets for the original four heroes!
